paragraph.paragraph: The Metric tool provides a Metric archive tab to handle archives. It allows comparison between results from different systems as well as for the same system over a period of time.
The metric tool allows two kinds of facilities concerning archives:

list.item: Creation and update for the loaded system
Comparison to another system whose measures have been archived

paragraph.paragraph:
